title: Guardians of the Galaxy
reason: Over two hours of space‑faring action and laugh‑out‑loud humor makes this a perfect pick for a partly cloudy day.

title: Rush Hour 2
reason: A two‑hour blend of martial‑arts action and comic banter that fits the upbeat yet moody feel of partial clouds.

title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
reason: Spanning more than two hours, this stylish spy thriller mixes sharp action with witty humor, matching a partially cloudy atmosphere.

title: Thor: Ragnarok
reason: With 130 minutes of colorful combat and comedic moments, it captures the energetic vibe of a partly cloudy sky.

title: Hot Fuzz
reason: Just over two hours of high‑octane police action blended with British humor, perfect for a day with scattered clouds.
